page.title: 06Education S/Prior,Clearbrook
page.content: In{Shaugh Prior County Primary School} there are thirty seven children who come from the villages of{Shaugh {Prior,Wotter & Lee Moor.}The age group is from five to eleven years.{Shaugh {Prior School}is the only school in our "D" block.There are two teachers in our school,one is an Infant teacher and one a Junior teacher and Headmaster.Most fourth years go to { {Ivybridge Comprehensive School}but some take the eleven plus to try to go to Grammar School in{Plymouth.}Some parents pay for their children to go to private schools. Children under eleven years who live in{Clearbrook} travel by bus to{Meavy Primary School For their secondary education they must go by bus to {Tavistock {Comprehensive School.}
